Page - Class in javawars.client.ui
 
Page(String) - Constructor for class javawars.client.ui.Page
This constructor (obligatory to evoke by subclasses) only registers the url of the page.
PAGE_NOT_FOUND - Static variable in class javawars.client.ui.Page
A composite that is displayed when this object is requested to show a child page that it cannot find.

PageWithHorizontalMenu - Class in javawars.client.ui
 
PageWithHorizontalMenu(String) - Constructor for class javawars.client.ui.PageWithHorizontalMenu
Creates a page object; since Page is an abstract class, this constructor is supposed to be evoked from overriding class if form of a super(arguments) expression
